item.title: ğŸ® JoyToKey
item.description:
YouTube Sports with Xbox Controller

RT: LMB, LT: RMB, LB: -10s, RB: 10s, RS: Mouse, LS: â†, PGUP, â†’, PGDN, Y: HOME, X: Slow, B: Unslow, A: Pause

PATH: C:\Users\$USER\Documents\JoyToKey\YT Sports.cfg

[General]
FileVersion=70
NumberOfJoysticks=2
NumberOfButtons=32
DisplayMode=2
UseDiagonalInput=0
UseDiagonalInput2=0
UsePOV8Way=0
RepeatSameKeyInSequence=0
Threshold=20
Threshold2=20
KeySendMode=0
SoundFile=
ImageFile=
VibrationSpeed1=0
VibrationSpeed2=0
VibrationDuration=0

[Joystick 1]

DefaultTemplateId=

item.title: ğŸ–¥ï¸ Win & DOS VMs
item.description:
Windows Activation in VM

Extract Windows 10 RTM OEM serial number (Ubuntu + flavors)

Windows 10 RTM OEM | Verified via: Thinkpad X270, Lenovo M73, and Thinkpad X1 Extreme G2

Thinkpad X270 users: BIOS 1.50 is ğŸ”—not compatible (drain but no charge) with aftermarket batteries (ğŸ”—1.47 is fine)
